name: Abrakalgebra
description:
You are a wizard trying to obtain energy from algebra cores. You went into the first challenge; linear equation. Use your mathematic skills to obtain the right core, but not the wrong ones. But be aware of falling boulders and shooting arrows.

FLASH WARNING!

Controls:
WASD or Arrow keys to move

Developed using Construct 3

Art made using Aseprite

Music made using Bosca Ceoil
